function App(){const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(false);const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[token,setToken]=useState(null);const[currentTab,setCurrentTab]=useState('dashboard');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{// Check for existing authentication
